channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The tech world should abandon minimalist design in favor of more ‘expressive’ options says Samsung’s first Chief Design Officer, Mauro Porcini
item.description: He pointed to industries like fashion, automotives and architecture, which offer consumers a range of design options.

item.title: Tech stocks linked to Bitcoin take a battering as crypto traders brace for Strategy to breach danger threshold
item.description: The leading Bitcoin treasury company's stock market cap is now worth less than the Bitcoin it holds.

item.title: ‘The Fed went to sleep’ says top economist Mohamed El-Erian, who wants to see the central bank reformed and presidents to ‘cool it’
item.description: Mohamed El-Erian calls for a visionary, less reactive Fed just as Trump settles on his next chair, with Hassett leading and independence fears resurfa...

item.title: Warren Buffett used to give his family $10,000 each at Christmas—but when he noticed how fast they were spending it, he started buying them shares instead
item.description: Something to consider as the $83 trillion inheritance wave kicks in.

item.title: 2026 will be the year of AI monetization, says Wedbush’s Dan Ives
item.description: Most forecasts indicate that both enterprise and overall global AI spending will rise.

item.title: Bayer stock sees its best day in 17 years
Strategy’s stock shows why it’s a trade, and not an investment
Nvidia’s stock is almost historically cheap — and that’s a good sign for bulls
U.S. stocks see shaky start to December in post-Thanksgiving ‘hangover’
Apple is making a big shakeup as it looks for an edge in AI
